item.title: Fuse
item.description: Live streamed daily exercise classes. Darren’s classes were previously at Fitness First in Brixton & Stockwell Primary school. He is offering combat fit, hip hop circuits, yoga, get ripped and HIIT. Â£20 per month for all online classes. Website: https://www.fusefitnesslondon.com/livestream
